element.name: TStackTracePointers
element.short: Array type used for Pointers to code addresses

descr.p: TStackTracePointers is an Array type which contains Pointers to code addresses. TStackTracePointers is the type passed as an argument to the GetStackTracePointers and StackTraceAsString routines. It is also the type used to implement the CreationStack and DestructionStack members in TDebugLCLItemInfo.

element.name: TLineInfoCacheItem
element.short: Record type used to store a pointer to a code address and its additional information

element.name: TLineInfoCacheItem.Addr
element.short: Pointer to the address for a source code symbol

element.name: TLineInfoCacheItem.Info
element.short: Contains additional information about the code address and its origin

element.name: PLineInfoCacheItem
element.short: Pointer to a TLineInfoCacheItem type

descr.p: Used in the implementation of the GetLineInfo routine.

element.name: RaiseGDBException
element.short: Raises an exception in the GDB debugger

descr.p: RaiseGDBException is a procedure used to raise an exception in the GDB debugger. Normally, GDB does not catch FPC Exception objects. This procedure raises a standard "Division By Zero" exception, which IS caught by GDB. This allows a program to be stopped in the debugger without extra GDB configuration.
descr.remark: Please note: For the Amiga platform, Division by Zero errors are not catchable. The program will simply crash.
descr.p: Msg contains the value used as the message in the exception.

element.name: RaiseGDBException.Msg
element.short: Value for the message in the exception

element.name: RaiseAndCatchException
element.short: Raises an exception that is caught and handled in an application

descr.p: RaiseAndCatchException is a procedure used to generate an Exception that is caught and handled by an application.
descr.remark: Please note: For the Amiga platform, Division by Zero errors are not catchable. The program will simply crash.

element.name: GetStackTrace
element.short: Retrieves backtrace information for code addresses

descr.p: GetStackTrace is a String function used to retrieve backtrace information for code addresses in a string format.

Calls GetLineInfo to get information for the code addresses, using the value in UseCache as an argument. UseCache indicates if cached line information from an internal AVL tree can be used in the routine. When UseCache contains False, the BackTraceStrFunc in lclproc.pas initialization section is called to get the line information for each of the backtrace addresses.

element.name: GetStackTrace.Result
element.short: String with information about backtrace addresses

element.name: GetStackTrace.UseCache
element.short: Indicates if cached line information can be used in the routine

element.name: GetStackTracePointers
element.short: Retrieve the addresses and information for a code address and its callers

descr.p: GetStackTracePointers is a procedure used to retrieve the addresses and information for a code address and its callers.
AStack is the array where pointers to code addresses for calling routines are stored.

element.name: GetStackTracePointers.AStack
element.short: Array where pointers to code addresses are stored

element.name: StackTraceAsString
element.short: Gets a string with backtrace information for the specified call stack

descr.p: StackTraceAsString is a String function used to get backtrace information for the code addresses specified in AStack. The return value contains lines with the values from GetLineInfo for each of the code addresses.
UseCache indicates if cached line information from an internal AVL tree can be used in the routine. It is passed as an argument in calls to the GetLineInfo routine.

element.name: StackTraceAsString.Result
element.short: String with backtrace information for the call stack

element.name: StackTraceAsString.AStack
element.short: Array of pointers to code addresses examined in the routine

element.name: StackTraceAsString.UseCache
element.short: Indicates if cached line information can be used in the routine

element.name: GetLineInfo
element.short: Gets information about the specified code address

descr.p: GetLineInfo is a String function used to get information about the code address specified in Addr.

UseCache indicates if cached line information from an internal AVL tree can be used in the routine. When UseCache contains False, the BackTraceStrFunc in the lclproc.pas initialization section is called to get the line information for each of the backtrace addresses.

element.name: GetLineInfo.Result
element.short: String with information about the code address

element.name: GetLineInfo.Addr
element.short: The code address examined in the routine

element.name: GetLineInfo.UseCache
element.short: Indicates if locally cached line information can be used in the routine
